localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 👋 FavEmojis.com is a website that allows you to save Emojis as favorites to have them always handy. Find the Emojis you need and just click to copy and paste them wherever you needed. For example to easy create ads, texts, designs.
blogPost.body: 👋 FavEmojis.com is a website that allows you to save Emojis as favorites to have them always handy. Find the Emojis you need and just click to copy and paste them wherever you needed. For example to easy create ads, texts, designs.
blogPost.title: 👋 FavEmoji – Copy & Paste Emojis - Save Emojis as favorites. Perfect to create ads/text/design.
blogPost.author: freund

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一个网站，允许你保存表情符号作为收藏夹，让他们总是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需点击复制和粘贴到你需要的地方。例如轻松创建广告、文本、设计。
localize.tagline: 将表情符号保存为收藏夹。完美的创建广告/文本/设计。

localize.description: 👋 FavEmojis.com是一個網站，允許你保存表情符號作爲收藏夾，讓他們總是方便。找到你需要的Emojis，只需點擊複製和粘貼到你需要的地方。例如輕鬆創建廣告、文本、設計。
localize.tagline: 將表情符號保存爲收藏夾。完美的創建廣告/文本/設計。

previous.excerpt: The app shows the UTC time in the menu bar or a Notification Center widget. This can be useful as a quick reference. You can also quickly copy the date & time in ISO8601 format. The app is free and requires macOS 11.1.
previous.title: UTC Time - Show the time in UTC in the menu bar or a widget

localize.description: 该应用程序在菜单栏或通知中心小部件中显示UTC时间。这可以作为一个快速的参考。你也可以快速复制ISO8601格式的日期和时间。该应用程序是免费的，需要macOS 11.1。
localize.tagline: 在菜单栏或小部件中以UTC显示时间。

localize.description: 該應用程序在菜單欄或通知中心小部件中顯示UTC時間。這可以作爲一個快速的參考。你也可以快速複製ISO8601格式的日期和時間。該應用程序是免費的，需要macOS 11.1。
localize.tagline: 在菜單欄或小部件中以UTC顯示時間。

next.excerpt: A habit tracker for both minimalists and power users (org mode fans). No social. No analytics. No account. No cloud. No lock-in.
next.title: Flat Habits - Frictionless habit tracking for iOS

localize.description: 一款适合极简主义者和实力派用户（org模式爱好者）的习惯追踪器。没有社交。没有分析。没有账户。没有云。没有锁定。
localize.tagline: iOS系统的无摩擦习惯追踪

localize.description: 一款適合極簡主義者和實力派用戶（org模式愛好者）的習慣追蹤器。沒有社交。沒有分析。沒有賬戶。沒有云。沒有鎖定。
localize.tagline: iOS系統的無摩擦習慣追蹤
